# Template: Frontmatter

Required in every page. Always at the very top of the file, before any other content.

## Exact Format

```mdx
---
title: [Topic title in Spanish]
description: [Single sentence in Spanish describing what the user will learn]
---
```

## Rules

- Title in Spanish, concise, avoid leading article when possible
- Description is a single sentence, no period at the end
- Never in English, never more than one line for description

## Real Example

```mdx
---
title: Presente Simple
description: Aprende a expresar rutinas, hechos y verdades generales en ingl√©s
---
```
